org.rapidcontext.app.plugin

Class PluginManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.rapidcontext.app.plugin.PluginManager

  • public class PluginManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A plug-in manager. This singleton class contains the utility functions for managing the plug-in loading and unloading.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Per Cederberg

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PluginManager.PluginClassLoader
      Simple extension of URLClassLoader to be able to add new URL:s after creation.

      • builtinDir

        public java.io.File builtinDir
        The built-in plug-in directory. This is the base directory from which built-in plug-ins are loaded.

      • pluginDir

        public java.io.File pluginDir
        The plug-in directory. This is the base directory from which plug-ins are loaded.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PluginManager

        public PluginManager(java.io.File builtinDir,
                     java.io.File pluginDir,
                     RootStorage storage)
        Creates a new plug-in storage.
        Parameters:
        builtinDir - the built-in plug-in directory
        pluginDir - the base plug-in directory
        storage - the storage to use for plug-ins

    • Method Detail

      • storagePath

        public static Path storagePath(java.lang.String pluginId)
        Returns the plug-in storage path for a specified plug-in id.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique plug-in id
        Returns:
        the plug-in storage path

      • configPath

        public static Path configPath(java.lang.String pluginId)
        Returns the plug-in configuration object path for a specified plug-in id.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique plug-in id
        Returns:
        the plug-in configuration storage path

      • pluginPath

        public static Path pluginPath(java.lang.String pluginId)
        Returns the plug-in instance path for a specified plug-in id.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique plug-in id
        Returns:
        the plug-in instance path

      • pluginId

        public static java.lang.String pluginId(Metadata meta)
        Returns the plug-in identifier for a storage object. The object storage paths will be used to return the first matching plug-in.
        Parameters:
        meta - the metadata object
        Returns:
        the plug-in identifier, or null if not found

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable(java.lang.String pluginId)
        Checks if the specified plug-in is currently available, i.e. if it has been mounted to the plug-in storage.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique plug-in id
        Returns:
        true if the plug-in was available, or false otherwise

      • isLoaded

        public boolean isLoaded(java.lang.String pluginId)
        Checks if the specified plug-in is currently loaded.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique plug-in id
        Returns:
        true if the plug-in was loaded, or false otherwise

      • config

        public Dict config(java.lang.String pluginId)
        Returns the specified plug-in configuration dictionary.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique plug-in id
        Returns:
        the plug-in configuration dictionary, or null if not found

      • install

        public java.lang.String install(java.io.File file)
                         throws PluginException
        Installs a plug-in from the specified file. If an existing plug-in with the same id already exists, it will be replaced without warning. Note that the new plug-in will NOT be loaded.
        Parameters:
        file - the plug-in ZIP file
        Returns:
        the unique plug-in id
        Throws:
        PluginException - if the plug-in couldn't be installed correctly

      • load

        public void load(java.lang.String pluginId)
          throws PluginException
        Loads a plug-in. The plug-in file storage will be added to the root overlay and the plug-in configuration file will be used to initialize the plug-in Java class.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique plug-in id
        Throws:
        PluginException - if the plug-in loading failed

      • unload

        public void unload(java.lang.String pluginId)
            throws PluginException
        Unloads a plug-in. All plug-in classes will be destroyed and the plug-in file storage will be hidden from the root overlay.
        Parameters:
        pluginId - the unique plug-in id
        Throws:
        PluginException - if the plug-in unloading failed

      • unloadAll

        public void unloadAll()
        Unloads all plug-ins. All plug-in classes will be destroyed and the plug-in file storages will be hidden from the root overlay. Note that the built-in plug-ins will be unaffected by this.
